[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: MethodCall {
            target: Variable(
                SimpleVariable(
                    SimpleVariable {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            7,
                        ),
                        name: "$a",
                    },
                ),
            ),
            arrow: Span(
                1,
                9,
            ),
            method: Variable(
                VariableVariable(
                    VariableVariable {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            11,
                        ),
                        variable: SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    1,
                                    12,
                                ),
                                name: "$b",
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ),
            arguments: ArgumentList {
                comments: CommentGroup {
                    comments: [],
                },
                left_parenthesis: Span(
                    1,
                    14,
                ),
                arguments: [],
                right_parenthesis: Span(
                    1,
                    15,
                ),
            },
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                1,
                16,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
